TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewInsertedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件中的 [插入] 按鈕時按一下範本時，及之後控制項更新資料來源的記錄。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked, and after the control updates the record at the data source. (插入按鈕是一個按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」。)事件可讓您執行自訂動作，例如針對插入的項目，從資料庫擷取自動產生的值。(An Insert button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Insert".) The event enables you to perform a custom action, such as retrieving auto-generated values from the database for the inserted item. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷插入項目可能會發生任何例外狀況的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of items inserted and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷插入作業所影響的項目數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of items affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否發生例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether an exception occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您有存取傳送到資料來源，使用插入的項目欄位值屬性。If you have to access the field values of the inserted item that were sent to the data source, use the property. 根據預設，控制清除插入作業之後，讓使用者可以新增要插入新項目值的範本。By default, the control clears the template after an insert operation, which enables users to add values for a new item to be inserted. 如果插入作業期間發生例外狀況，則可以保留控制項在插入模式下，藉由設定屬性`true`。If an exception occurs during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 這會重新繫結範本的值從先前嘗試插入項目。This rebinds the template to the values from the previous attempt to insert an item. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用傳遞至處理常式物件事件。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to the handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 affectedRows, class System.Exception exception) cil managed

param.name: affectedRows
param.span: 插入作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

param.name: exception
param.span: 在執行插入作業時引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: The exception that is raised when the insert operation was performed, if any.

param.span: 如果沒有引發例外狀況，請將這個參數設為 。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use for this parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時，這個建構函式主要會由控制項開發人員使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events. 下表顯示 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 參數的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||中所包含的物件`e`參數。The object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得插入作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.

value.span: 插入作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷所影響的插入作業的記錄數目，所傳回的資料來源控制項。Use the property to determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, as returned by the data source control. 這個屬性通常用於下列案例：This property is typically used in the following scenarios: - 若要確認已插入一筆記錄。To verify that only a single record was inserted. 有時候撰寫不正確的 insert 陳述式可以插入多筆記錄。Sometimes an incorrectly written insert statement can insert multiple records. - 若要確認記錄並未插入因為插入作業期間發生錯誤，但未引發例外狀況。To verify that a record was not inserted because an error occurred during the insert operation, but an exception was not raised. - 若要確認記錄已插入時支援衝突偵測 （開放式並行存取） 的資料來源控制項有其屬性設定為`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`列舉值。To verify that a record was inserted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency) has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 支援此屬性的控制項包括和控制項。Controls that supports this property include the and controls. 當屬性具有這個值時，如果有另一位使用者所插入的記錄相同索引鍵的值可能不會插入一筆記錄。When the property has this value, a record might not be inserted if it has the same key value as a record inserted by another user. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用傳遞至的處理常式物件事件，以判斷是否已插入作業期間引發例外狀況。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to a handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得插入作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.

value.span: 在插入作業中引發的例外狀況，而如果沒有引發例外狀況則為 。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the insert operation, or if no exception was raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引發例外狀況和您處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式中，設定中屬性`true`。If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否則，控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用傳遞至的處理常式物件事件，以判斷是否已插入作業期間引發例外狀況。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to a handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在事件處理常式中處理插入作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果例外狀況在事件處理常式中已經過處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當插入作業期間引發例外狀況時，使用屬性，指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，會被視為處理，而且不會重新擲回的例外狀況。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`、控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用傳遞至處理常式物件事件，以判斷是否已插入作業期間引發例外狀況。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to the handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInInsertMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.KeepInInsertMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者的輸入值是否保留給 範本內的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user's input values are preserved for the controls inside the template.

value.span: 如果使用者的輸入值保留給 範本內的控制項則為 ，而如果使用者的輸入值會替換為控制項的預設值則為 。

span.span: if the user's input values are preserved for the controls inside the template; if the user's input values are replaced with the default values for the controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項重設控制項的值從成為其預設值，在插入作業之後的範本。By default, the control resets the control's values from the template to their default values after an insert operation. 這可讓使用者加入新項目要插入的值。This enables users to add values for a new item to be inserted. 如果插入作業期間引發例外狀況，則可以保留控制項在插入模式下，藉由設定屬性`true`。If an exception is raised during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 從先前嘗試插入內控制項的項目值以維護範本。This maintains the values from the previous attempt to insert an item for the controls inside the template. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來保存插入作業期間發生錯誤時，使用者所輸入的值。The following example shows how to use the property to preserve the values entered by the user when an error occurs during the insert operation. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得已插入之資料錄的欄位名稱/值組。

span.span: Gets field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

value.span: 已插入之資料錄的欄位名稱/值組。

span.span: The field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取插入記錄欄位的值。Use the property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record. 例如，您可以使用這些值來插入記錄的記錄。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records. 屬性會傳回實作物件介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含插入的資料錄的欄位表示的物件。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the inserted record. 若要存取的欄位名稱，請使用屬性物件。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同樣地，您可以存取的欄位值使用屬性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 快速的方式，您也可以使用的索引子物件來存取該欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 使用索引子的優點是，它會直接傳回欄位值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. 資料來源的欄位順序所依賴的控制項 (例如) 可以只依索引存取欄位的值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index.
